view

Class MazeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.BasicWindow
        • view.MazeWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer, View

    public class MazeWindow
extends BasicWindow
implements View, java.util.Observer

    MazeWindow class

    extends basic window and implements view and java observer interface

    This is the general maze window which contains all the widgets

    Since:
    09-20-2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tal Oyar & Tomer Cohen
    See Also:
    view, observer, window
